name: Ball Twisty Line Rolling
description:
Venture down the helix road and control the rolling ball on the path. Start the descent and prepare to jump and slide to get the highscore! The road won’t be easy – twisted turns and constantly rising speed will increase the challenge at long distances!

Ball Twisty Line Rolling features:
• Random map generation
• 20 unlockable ball skins
• Fun and addictive gameplay
• A chance to train your reaction and decision-making skills

You can roll off the road and skip a turn by landing lower down the track. But if you will fall from a big height, your ball will be destroyed and the game will be over! Steer your ball and improve your reaction to reach the highest score! Download as title game and show your skills on the track!
